Class java.security.AccessController

Added Methods
T doPrivileged(PrivilegedExceptionAction<T>, AccessControlContext, Permission[]) Performs the specified {@code PrivilegedExceptionAction} with privileges enabled and restricted by the specified {@code AccessControlContext} and with a privilege scope limited by specified {@code Permission} arguments.
T doPrivileged(PrivilegedAction<T>, AccessControlContext, Permission[]) Performs the specified {@code PrivilegedAction} with privileges enabled and restricted by the specified {@code AccessControlContext} and with a privilege scope limited by specified {@code Permission} arguments.
